name: Super Hot Pellet Muncher 2000
description:
Time stops when you stop! It's Pellet-Time®!

Four game modes:

Super Hot
Pellet-Time at full speed
Super Kid Pellet
Pellet-Time with speed & timing progression
Super Mr Pellet
Classic muncher with speed & timing progression
Super Ms Pellet
Speed-hacked classic muncher!

Three skins included:
 Mr. Pellet, Ms. Pellet and Kid Pellet.

...

(made with Pico-8)
